paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: KCNH2 variants were found in 11.1% (10/90) of SUDEP individuals.

functional_data.summary: Functional analysis revealed a significant reduction in current amplitude (> 20%) for R744X mutated channels relative to wild-type channels.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on functional analysis
variants.additional_notes: R744X is reported as pathogenic in ClinVar.
key_quotes: Loss‐of‐function KCNH2 variants, defined as causing >20% reduction in maximal amplitude, were observed in 8.9% (8/90) SUDEP patients.
